landing.hero_title: Get More Google Reviews, Get More Customers üöÄ
landing.hero_subtitle_bold: Increase reviews on Google Maps to increase your reach.
landing.hero_subtitle: ReviewBoost makes it easy for your customers to leave 5-star reviews in seconds. More reviews = More trust = More sales.
landing.reviewboost_desc: More reviews mean higher ranking on Google Maps. ReviewBoost simplifies the process: your customers scan a QR code and post a positive review instantly. No complicated steps.
landing.before_after_subtitle: See how your review collection changes from manual effort to instant results.
landing.before_desc: Customer scans ‚Üí thinks ‚Üí types ‚Üí gets busy ‚Üí skips review.
landing.after_desc: One scan ‚Üí AI suggestions ‚Üí review posted instantly.
landing.after_result: Result: More reviews, higher ranking, more customers
landing.step1_desc: Customer simply scans your ReviewBoost QR or taps the NFC card.
landing.step2_desc: AI suggests ready-made SEO friendly review lines ‚Äî customer selects one.
landing.step3_desc: Review opens instantly on Google ‚Äî customer just hits 'Post'.

landing.bonus_ai: ü§ñ Bonus: AI Auto-Reply instantly responds to every new review.
landing.clients_subtitle: Real Photos of ReviewBoost in Action
landing.clients_desc: Printed QRs on counters, standees, delivery packages, and field visits.
landing.testimonials_desc: Real words from businesses using ReviewBoost.
landing.cta_footer_subtitle: Make review collection effortless and boost your Google ranking with ReviewBoost.
landing.gst_included: All above plans are GST included.
landing.cta_final_button: Book Now & Get Free NFC Card üéÅ
landing.footer_tagline: AI-Powered Google Review Collection for Modern Businesses
landing.test1_text: We used to ask customers to review, but they forgot. Now with the standee, they do it while waiting. Our garage rating is now 4.8!
landing.test2_text: People love seeing that we are a genuine farm. The Google reviews help build that trust instantly. Great tool for small businesses.
landing.test3_text: Foreigners find us easily on Google Maps now. The reviews help them trust our quality before visiting.
landing.test4_text: Even with the rush, customers find time to scan and review. It's become part of the Shrewsbury biscuit experience!
landing.test5_text: Generations trust us, but the digital youth checks reviews. ReviewBoost bridged that gap perfectly.

features.ai_suggestions_desc: AI writes the review for them

pricing.title: Investment
pricing.subtitle: One plan, everything included. Start growing today.

faq.title: Questions?
faq.subtitle: We have answers
faq.a1: Yes. We focus on speed. Your customer scans, selects a positive review, and posts. It takes less than 10 seconds.
faq.a2: Not at all. We set everything up for you. You just place the standee at your counter.
faq.q3: How does it help my ranking?
faq.a3: Google prefers businesses with frequent, high-quality reviews. ReviewBoost ensures you get a steady stream of 5-star reviews with keywords.
faq.q4: What is included in the plan?
faq.a4: You get the digital platform, a QR standee, and access to the dashboard.
